mcq.statement: The porter respectfully assured the lady that he would take care of her baggage while she bought her ticket.

options.a: The porter said, "I will take care of your baggage while you buy your ticket, Madam."
options.b: The porter said, "I would take care of your baggage while you buy your ticket, Madam."
options.c: The porter said, "I would take care of your baggage while you bought your ticket, Madam."
